title: S119 - Fantastic Specials Going On! A/C Amenities, Beautiful Views!
posting_body: Experience The Best At Waterfront Place!
A brand-new luxury apartment community located on the largest public marina on the West Coast.
Our community boasts gorgeous views of the Olympic Mountains and the Everett Marina, while also offering state of the art amenities.
Be a part of making history in Everett by joining this one-of-a-kind community.
Use this link for more information:
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 884Sq.
- Quartz countertops and full contemporary backsplash
- Large under-mount sink with retractable faucet
- Stainless steel top-freezer refrigerator with ice maker
- Rooftop Club Room with Media Center
- Secure bike storage with repair center
- Secure bike storage with repair center
1300 West Marine View Dr Everett, Everett, WA, 98201
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
